alert.note: Alert for Sawtooth, Stanley Basin (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued June 11 at 2:24PM MDT until June 13 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... The Flash Flood Watch continues for * A portion of central Idaho, including the following area, Sawtooth/Stanley Basin. * From Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall over the Boundary Fire burn scar is expected during the period of the watch. Be sure to stay up to date with information from local authorities. Heavy rainfall could trigger flash flooding and debris flows in and near recent wildfire burn scars.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
